ValidationRule.description: Requires all question and follow up question records to have an answer before submitting.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Ready_to_Submit__c, "Yes"), ISPICKVAL( Ready_to_Resubmit__c , "Yes")), OR( Number_of_Questions__c> Number_of_Qs_Answered__c, Number_of_Follow_Up_Qs__c> Number_of_Follow_Up_Qs_Answered_1__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: All questions must be answered before submitting. Please change the answer below to "--None--", return to the Questionnaire tab, and complete all questions before submitting.
